Name: Monochrome World
About the game: Then one day, I fell to the place I've never been before. The power unknown led me to the color I thought was lost. I had no idea what it meant... ◆The adventure of a raindrop 『Monochrome World』 features the journey of a raindrop to recolor the gray world. Bring back the colors to the world in a total of 60 stages! ◆Thrilling action puzzle experience with extreme difficulty Recolor the stages full of gimmicks and puzzles! Some parts will test your speed and control! ◆Make your own cute little raindrop Clear the stage and unlock colors, shapes, accessories, and skills. Customize your own little raindrop!
Meta Title: Monochrome World: May 7, 2020, RAREST and Full Overview
